Package moduloTimesTable

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • moduloTimesTable.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    TimesTableFXML.fxml sheet Controller. All primary logic for the application occurs here.

        public Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Called when stage is launched. Initializes the stage. Displays default values and establishes a listener for the fpsSlider.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • timeSetPressed

        public void timeSetPressed()
        Called when new times value is entered and set button pressed. Resets and pauses animation.

      • colorSet

        public void colorSet()
        Called when color is selected from colorSelection node. Will then set the color of all children in pane drawPane to the specified color.

      • goBttnPressed

        public void goBttnPressed()
        Called when go to Node button is pressed. Resets the animation and runs until specific node is reached. Node specified is grabbed from nodeInput text field. Will display an error pop-up in the event the node requested is larger than the number of nodes available.

      • playPressed

        public void playPressed()
        Called when the play/pause button is pressed. Will play/pause the animation by starting and stopping animationTimer timer.

      • photosPress

        public void photosPress()
        Called when photoBttn pressed. Launches a new stage that shows photos that have been previously saved, allows the user to cycle through the photos. Will launch an error pop-up if not photos have been saved.

      • saveView

        public void saveView()
        Saves current animation view using snapshot() method. Photos are added in a WritableImage vector called savedImages. Will show pop-up notifying user that the image has been saved.

      • dotSetPressed

        public void dotSetPressed()
        Called when set button for dot input is pressed. Will set new dot count value and reset the animation. Calculates a new set of coordinates based on input.

      • resetPressed

        public void resetPressed()
        Called either by other functions through fire() or when resetBttn is pressed. Resets the animation and reverts to default values. Pauses animation.

      • rainbowPressed

        public void rainbowPressed()
        Called when rainbowBttn is pressed. Resets current color to red if color is white. Disables the colorCycle button id enabled. Sets the color of the dots to white.

      • colorCyclePressed

        public void colorCyclePressed()
        Called when color cycle is Selected. Disables rainbow button. Sets current color to red.

      • dotsCheckBoxClicked

        public void dotsCheckBoxClicked()
        Called when the dots enabled button is checked or unchecked. Will draw dots if none are present or set the opacity of existing dots to zero.
